content:
Based on the provided logs, I'll generate a report summarizing the existing structures and error tips.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron/Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0,0)
- Stone furnace at position (2,0)
- Stone furnace at position (4,4)
All furnaces have coal fuel but are currently idle with no ingredients

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5)
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Science Pack Processing (Position 0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Science pack handling system:
- Lab at position (0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position (0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Prerequisites
- Research technologies in correct order - many technologies require prerequisite research:
  - Fluid handling requires Engine research
  - Oil processing requires Fluid handling
  - Solar energy requires Optics
  - Advanced electronics requires Plastics
  - Chemical science pack requires Advanced electronics
  - Electric energy distribution 2 requires Chemical science pack
  - Logistics 3 requires Production science pack

### Technology Research State Validation
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again:
  - Electronics
  - Steel processing
  - Advanced material processing

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers to maintain power generation

### Technology Name References
- Use correct technology names as defined in the Technology enum:
  - "EngineUnit" and "Optics" are not valid technology names
